name: GNTT Scroll Up
author: Golzar Rahman

sections.description: To display the Scroll Up button at the bottom of your site you have to just install the plugin. plugin url:’http://market.mathgr.com/gntt-scroll-up/’
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and extract the contents,
  2. Upload the folder local-time-clock to your WP plugin folder /wp-content/plugins/ directory,
  3. Go to Plugins > Plugins, and activate the plugin,
  4. To display the Scroll Up button at the bottom of your all pages, all posts and everywhere in your site, you have to just install the plugin.
sections.faq:
Q. Is GNTT Scroll Up free?

Ans.Yeah, 1.0 version is free. But, for premium version should be paid.You will get option panel in the premium version and will change button-color as your wish.

Q. Can I use multiple display?

Ans.Yeah, it will make a display on home page,all posts, all pages everywhere.

Q. Can I use Different size?

Ans.Yeah, to use different size you have to use premium version.Similarly you can change button-color.
